Suppl Xu et al,  Suppl.Table 1. In Vivo Hemodynamic and Echocardiographic Measurements  Con (n=8) CHT (n=7) DHT (n=7) HR (beats/min) 348 ± 17 326 ± 23 345 ± 21 BW (g) 424 ± 9 401 ± 14 436 ± 23 LV mass (g) 0.97 ± 0.03 1.35 ± 0.07* 1.46 ± 0.078* LV mass/BW (g/kg) 2.29 ± 0.07 3.4 ± 0.26* 3.4 ± 0.25* LVDd (mm) 7.15 ± 0.21 6.83 ± 0.14 7.9 ± 0.24* LVDs (mm) 3.6 ± 0.18 3.13 ± 0.14 5.26 ± 0.16* FS% 50 ± 2 56 ± 2* 33 ± 2* AWd (mm) 2.06 ± 0.10 2.93 ± 0.21* 2.86 ± 0.22* PWd (mm) 2.05 ± 0.09 2.94 ± 0.21* 2.94 ± 0.14* RWT 0.58 ± 0.03 0.86 ± 0.06* 0.75 ± 0.06* LVSP (mm Hg) 106 ± 2 191 ± 4* 186 ± 5* LVdevP/g (mm Hg/g) 100 ± 3 130 ± 7* 119 ± 7* LV dP/dtmax (mm Hg/s) 7532 ± 228 7862 ± 251 7263 ± 115  LV dP/dtmin (mm Hg/s) 4867 ± 211 4987 ± 192  5248 ± 210  LVEDP (mm Hg) 5.1 ± 0.3 11.4 ± 0.4* 13.3 ± 0.5* Con, Control; CHT, compensated hypertrophy; DHT, decompensated hypertrophy; HR, heart rate; BW, body weight; LV mass, left ventricular mass; LVDd, left ventricular diastolic diameter; LVDs, left ventricular systolic diameter; FS, fractional shortening; AWd, anterior wall thickness; PWd, posterior wall thickness; RWT, relative wall thickness calculated as the ratio of 2posterioir wall thickness and LVDd; LVSP, left ventricular systolic pressure; LVdevP/g, left ventricular developed pressure per g LV; LVEDP, left ventricular end diastolic pressure. *P<0.05 vs Control.
